description:
The JMESPath query language allows you to select, slice, filter, map, project, flatten, sort, and all sorts of operations on data.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/endpoints/jmespath/
title: JMESPath: Response manipulation with query language

expr.title: Expression
expr.description:
The JMESPath expression you want to apply to this endpoint.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/enterprise/endpoints/jmespath/
